original_title: Il Libro Della Giungla. Odio e Amore
overview: A newborn baby who survived an accident in the jungle is adopted by a family of wolves who name him Mowgli. The child is accepted and loved by the whole community, including Akela, the wise old wolf, Bagheera the panther who has lived a long time among humans, Baloo the friendly and nice bear.
title: Il Libro Della Giungla. Odio e Amore
